name: Illusory Demonic Globe, Attoractia
text:
T: Choose one - Remove target resonator, addition, or regalia with an attribute from the game if it doesn't share an attribute with a card in any removed area that was removed by this card; or remove target resonator, addition, or regalia with no attribute from the game if there are no cards with no attribute that were removed by this card in any removed area.
T, put six cards in any removed area that were removed by this card into their owners' graveyards: You win the game.
